embed.title: {{client}} â€” Help Center
embed.description:
Hi {{author}}, I'm {{client}}. A multi-purpose BOT developed purely in Typescript.

If you want to know more information about a certain command use **{{prefix}}help [command name]**.
Use the menu to display commands for each category.
embed.description_2:
Hi {{author}}, I'm {{client}}.A multi-purpose BOT developed purely in Typescript.

If you want to know more information about a certain command use **/help command: [command name]**.
Use the menu to display commands for each category.

member: You `don't need permissions` to use this command.
You need the permissions: `{{permission}}` to use this command.
client: The {{client}} `does not need permissions` to run this command.
The {{client}} needs the permissions: `{{permission}}` to execute this command.

name: About Me:
value:
Hello {{author}} I'm an application created by [{{tag}}](https://discord.com/users/{{id}}/) and programmed in [Typescript](https://www.typescriptlang.org), I am a simple Brazilian robot with the incredible intention of helping many people on their servers, with moderation commands, utilities, economy and several other commands. I'm currently in **constantly developing** but there are many commands to explore. 

To access my list with some commands type: `{{help}}`. 
To access some more detailed information about a given command type: `{{usage}}`.
